title: Elementary Computer Virus Education Design: Application of Video-Based Narrative Pedagogy

context.prior_knowledge: Basic comprehension of educational theory and instructional design methodologies
context.additional_context: Practical-oriented course for elementary students to strengthen computer virus education design competencies. Requires video production tools and online collaboration platforms

learning_goals: Learners can design narrative-based computer virus education content suitable for elementary students' cognitive levels
Learners can develop educational scenarios that enhance knowledge acquisition and long-term retention using video-based instructional methods
They can develop the practical competency to analyze formative assessment data and apply it to improve instructional design.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
